description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 9, 2023 at 2:00pm EST. All bids submitted after 2:00pm EST will result in the bid being declared nonresponsive. The ITQ is the first phase of a procurement process by Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC), for Digital Platform Modernization Phase 3 (DPM P3). The ITQ invites suppliers to prequalify in accordance with terms and conditions of the ITQ including mandatory and rated evaluation requirements. IRCC has a requirement for various Goods and Services for a multiphased Programme designed to modernize and optimize the Department’s systems and processes used to process client applications for immigration, refugee and citizenship services. Following the ITQ and RRR, the RFP is anticipated to contain two streams to allow for Prime SIs and CTVs to be bid on the RFP in partnership. Following RFP evaluations, it is anticipated that the procurement will result in the award of two separate contracts; one to a Contractor (the “Prime System Integrator (SI)”) who will have overall responsibility for the implementation of the DPM P3 Solution and one to a Core Technology Vendor (CTV) who will provide core technology products, licensing, and initial support and maintenance. This ITQ process is not a solicitation of bids or tenders. REMINDER: All enquiries must be submitted in writing to the Contracting Authority via e-mail to TPSGC.PAProjetMPN-APDPMProject.PWGSC@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca, no later than December 19, 2022 at 2:00PM ET. Enquiries received after that date will not be answered.

full_summary:
### Invitation to Qualify: Digital Platform Modernization Phase 3

#### Reference and Solicitation Numbers
* Reference Number: WS3228586309-Doc3726775683
* Solicitation Number: WS3228586309

#### Tender Overview

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC), invites suppliers to prequalify for the Digital Platform Modernization Phase 3 (DPM P3) ITQ. The ITQ is the first phase of a procurement process that will result in the award of two separate contracts: one for a Prime System Integrator (SI) and another for a Core Technology Vendor (CTV).

#### Background

The Department of Citizenship & Immigration (IRCC) requires a multiphased programme to modernize and optimize the Department's systems and processes used to process client applications for immigration, refugee, and citizenship services. The selected Prime SI will have overall responsibility for the implementation of the DPM P3 Solution, while the CTV will provide core technology products, licensing, and initial support and maintenance.

#### ITQ Process

The ITQ process is not a solicitation of bids or tenders. Suppliers interested in participating must submit an Expression of Interest through Ariba Discovery. The deadline for submitting bids is January 9, 2023 at 2:00 pm EST. Late bids will be considered non-responsive.

#### Requirements and Evaluation Criteria

The ITQ requires suppliers to meet mandatory evaluation requirements and rated evaluation criteria. The evaluation process will consider the following:

* Supplier's experience and qualifications
* Technical capabilities
* Price and other factors

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Stephanie Hall (SPAC/PSPC) by email at [stephanie.hall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:stephanie.hall@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca). All enquiries must be submitted in writing no later than December 19, 2022 at 2:00 pm ET.

#### Notice URL

[http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14483284?extsite=MTQ0ODMyODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14483284?extsite=MTQ0ODMyODRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
